title: China: French-Inspired Grandeur in Xining with Three Restaurants, Indoor Pool & Spa
description:
Like a gleaming pearl in the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, Sofitel Xining brings unprecedented French splendour to Northwest China's capital. As the city's first international luxury hotel, it showcases an abundance of Parisian elegance and local flair throughout. Every moment promises the ideal balance of adventure and luxury in this frontier city.

Indulge your palate at three dining venues, including the exquisite Le Chinois restuarant offering refined cuisine in an elegant, old-world setting. After exploring Xining's cultural treasures, dive into the indoor heated pool where coloured glass reflections dance across the water's surface, or surrender to bliss at the rejuvenating spa.
offer_address: 63 Wu Si Xi Road, Chengxi District, Xining 810008, China
